attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Northen Rock has cost the UK Taxpayer 25Billion£ why should we the taxpayer support a private company. While not blaming the government for this disaster, they should not be supporting a failing company (otherwise, if thats the case please lend Sheffield Wednesday the same amount°

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
